title: Compress All! 3.2 – Compress your photos & images in seconds to reduce space
content: Save space on your computer by compressing your photos/images. With Compress All you can compress a set of photos/images quickly without the need to be an expert in image processing.   You can add your photos/images, change the compress factor on a simple slider, marked with min (minimum compression) and max (max compression), and save. title: Oh My Schedule! I’m a Doctor Pro 1.0 – A useful optimize and organize tool for doctors

title: Epubor Ultimate 3.0.8.14 – Convert eBook formats and remove DRM
